basic.description:
Intermediate study in relations between moving-image media and other visual or performing arts.
LEARNING HOURS    108 (36L;24Lb;48P)
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Media and the Arts

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     [FILM110 or (FILM104&106) or IDIS210] and a GPA of 2.60.0
